On Fri, 10 Jan 2003, Daniel Paul Hightower <dph_of_rules@...> wrote:

> After completing (or exiting) the Xth scenario in the game or loading
> the Xth scenario in the scenario editor.

Hmm.. That doesn't sound like that leak, so it might be something
different. I have been unable to replicate the crash on Linux with
Openglad .97 or Win2k with openglad 0.97 or 0.95. I havn't tried Win98,
and chances are that that's the least stable out of anything.

- Yan
